desc: <span class='help-method'>Epsilon-Support Vector Regression. The free parameters in the model are C and epsilon. The implementation is based on libsvm.
urlparagraph: Read more in the User Guide.

tutorial.desc: Learn more on Oncoscape + Sci-Kit clustering methods

params.name: kernel
params.desc: Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm.

params.name: degree
params.desc: Degree of the polynomial kernel function (‘poly’).

params.name: C
params.desc: Penalty parameter C of the error term.

params.name: epsilon
params.desc: Epsilon in the epsilon-SVR model. It specifies the epsilon-tube

params.name: shrinking
params.desc: Whether to use the shrinking heuristic.

params.name: cache_size
params.desc: Specify the size of the kernel cache (in MB).

params.name: max_iter
params.desc: Hard limit on iterations within solver, or -1 for no limit.

attrs.name: dual_coef_
attrs.desc: Coefficients of the support vector in the decision function.

attrs.name: coef_
attrs.desc: Weights assigned to the features (coefficients in the primal
